description:
The essential Priceline Hotels, Flights, and Cars app will save you big money when you book. Score mobile-exclusive deals, even on last minute bookings. Rated by Travel + Leisure (and The Negotiator himself) as a Best App for Travelers! 

We've got the skills to shrink your travel bills!
Choose from over 300,000 hotels along with thousands of flights and rental cars, then rest your head knowing that you saved some serious coin on your next vacation.

Save Time. Save Money. 
• No bidding? No problem. Save up to 55% on hotel Express Deals® (now available for flights and rental cars too!)
• Become a Negotiator and Name Your Own Price® to save up to 60% on hotels and 40% on rental cars.
• Sign-in to save time and view all your Priceline itineraries at home or on-the-go. 

Hotel Rooms 
• Find huge deals from over 300k hotels on sale every day. 
• Browse photos and guest reviews from fellow deal finders. 
• Advanced filters available to refine and personalize your search.
• Exclusive Tonight-Only℠ Deals for last minute hotel reservations. 
• Draw your search area right on the map (available on iPad). 

Flights 
• Find and book flights to anywhere on the globe, domestic and international. 
• Get steep discounts without the bidding using our Express Deals® for airline tickets.
• Sort airfare by Price, Duration, Airline, and Departure Time. 
• Feeling adventurous? Try Explore (available on iPad) and search flights to popular Priceline destinations. 

Rental Cars 
• Search thousands of cars to find the deal you need in record time. 
• Find exactly what you want with our advanced filters. 
• Save BIG with our newly added Express Deals® on rental cars.
releaseNotes:
Do you smell that? That's the smell of fresh-made deals.
• We've added more mobile-exclusive deals to help you save on your next trip!
• We've improved Express Deals® for Flights to help you book with confidence.

Stay on Schedule
• Enable the Priceline Today widget in your Notification Center to view upcoming itineraries when you're on the go.

iPhone 6 and 6 Plus Users Rejoice!
• Our team has been working 'round the clock to optimize the app for your shiny, new devices.

One more thing...
• Move seamlessly between devices with Handoff. Start booking on your phone and pick up where you left off on your Mac!
